Client: Ludus Alliance - smart martial art equipment, Israel


Services: App Design | Art & Illustration | Motion Design


The Challenge: Create an app experience empowers all athletes, coaches and clubs to use new technology and methodology which enables the martial arts of today to enter a new domain based on the values and techniques of ancient traditions. 


COACH APP

The Coach App allows coaches to analyze athlete performance data and manage their club infrastructure and groups


WARRIORS APP

The Warriors App allows athletes to track their personal and group performance within official Ludus Competitions, and allows them to register to the Ludus Alliance.


Creative Director and Artist - Sagi Rechter

App Designer - Sagi Rechter

App Developers - Ludus Materials and Starry Byte

Motion Artists - Roy Manor and Rechter Design
